text: "Vital Signs" is a 1982 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush. It was taken from their eighth studio album Moving Pictures and was heavily influenced by reggae rock music by The Police. It was carried over into its next three studio albums. It went to number 41 in the United Kingdom after it was released there. == References == Category:1982 songs Category:Rush (band) songs Category:Progressive rock songs Category:Reggae rock songs
title: Vital Signs (Rush song)
